channel.title: ui on Miro's World
channel.description: Recent content in ui on Miro's World

item.title: Unlike Vista, this user interface *is* something new
item.description: Quite seldom I see something on the net that is elegant, beautiful, and simple - so simple that it becomes obvious. Last time I had this feeling was with iPod's wheel. There was lots of excitement about new Vista user interface features. The users who never used / saw OS-X, must love Vista. It is huge improvement over XP - much nicer, cleaner, very good typography, comes very close to Tiger.
